content: The story could continue by exploring the idea of consciousness and oblivion further. One possibility is that the protagonist, who is reflecting on the nature of consciousness, experiences some form of amnesia or loss of consciousness, and the rest of the short film follows their journey to regain or understand their consciousness. Another possibility is that the protagonist's reflection on consciousness leads them to explore different forms of consciousness, such as sleep, dreams, and anesthesia, and the film becomes an exploration of the different states of consciousness and their relationship to oblivion. The story could also continue by delving deeper into the relationship between the protagonist and the person they are resting on, and how this relationship relates to their understanding of consciousness and oblivion. Ultimately, the story could take many different directions, but the themes of consciousness and oblivion should remain central to the narrative.
